user.title: Choose Connection Mode
user.description: Select how you want to connect to Hydro-Québec

data_description.auth_mode: Portal Mode: Sign in for full account access. OpenData Mode: Use public data only (no login required)

data_description.contract_name: A friendly name for this contract (e.g., 'Home', 'Cottage')

data_description.contract: Select the contract you want to add to Home Assistant

calendar.title: Calendar Integration (Optional)
calendar.description: Automatically create calendar events for critical peak periods for {contract_name}. Events will use standardized French titles for blueprint compatibility.

data_description.calendar_entity_id: Select a calendar entity to create peak events. Leave empty to skip calendar integration.

calendar_opendata.title: Calendar Integration (Optional)
calendar_opendata.description: Automatically create calendar events for critical peak periods for {contract_name}. Events will use standardized French titles for blueprint compatibility.

data_description.calendar_entity_id: Select a calendar entity to create peak events. Leave empty to skip calendar integration.

import_history.title: Import Consumption History
import_history.description: Configure consumption sync for the Energy Dashboard. Enable to import hourly consumption data. If enabled, the last 30 days will be synced automatically. Maximum available history is 800 days. Set to 0 to skip additional history import. The import runs in the background and may take several minutes.

data_description.enable_consumption_sync: Enable to create consumption sensors and sync hourly data for Energy Dashboard. Disable if you don't need consumption tracking or have another integration providing this data.
data_description.history_days: Number of days to import (0-800). Set to 0 to sync only the last 30 days, or enter a value for older history. Only applies if consumption sync is enabled.

opendata.title: OpenData Mode - Select Sector
opendata.description: Configure monitoring using public data (no login required). First, select your customer sector.

data_description.sector: Select whether you are a residential or commercial customer

opendata_offer.title: OpenData Mode - Select Rate
opendata_offer.description: Select your electricity rate plan for {sector} customers. Available options are fetched from Hydro-Québec's public API.

data_description.contract_name: A friendly name for this configuration (e.g., 'Home', 'Cottage')
data_description.rate_selection: Select your electricity rate plan from available options

error.no_contracts: No contracts found for this account
error.portal_unavailable: Hydro-Québec portal is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.portal_maintenance: Hydro-Québec portal is under maintenance (Error 500). Please try again in a few hours.

data_description.update_interval: How often to fetch data from Hydro-Québec (30-600 seconds)
data_description.preheat_duration_minutes: Duration before critical peak events to trigger pre-heating (0-240 minutes)
data_description.enable_consumption_sync: Enable to sync hourly consumption data for the energy dashboard. Requires integration reload to take effect.
data_description.calendar_entity_id: Calendar entity for peak events (DPC/DCPC rates only). Leave empty to disable.
